description: Try our easy to follow Quick Pulled Pork Tacos recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Taco,Low sugar,Christmas leftovers,Easter leftovers,Quick & easy dinner,High protein,High fibre,Pork,Tomato,Avocado,Leftovers
name: Quick Pulled Pork Tacos Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 tbs hot Mexican chilli sauce (to taste)

recipeInstructions.text: Mix tomato, avocado and onion in a bowl. Combine sour cream and chilli sauce in a small bowl. Set aside.

Heat pork following packet directions. Place in a bowl and stir in hoisin sauce. Heat taco shells following packet directions. Fill with salad leaves, shredded pork and tomato salsa. Garnish with coriander and serve with chilli sour cream on the side.
